item.title: Forestry + GitLab
item.description: Now you can add a Forestry.io CMS to your GitLab.com static site (Jekyll or Hugo). I’ve been a GitLab user since their very first release in Oct of 2011. I worked at a design agency and converted everything over from SVN to Git and used an internal GitLab installation. I remember submitting a few bugs and Dmitriy was quick to fix them. We loved GitLab then, and still do today.
